mapper.select: SELECT p.checkouttime FROM b_otaorder o LEFT JOIN b_otaroomorder m ON o.id = m.OtaOrderId LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder p ON m.PMSRoomOrderNo = p.PmsRoomOrderNo AND p.Hotelid = o.HotelId where o.id = ${id}
